title: Changing letter size for free.
body: I just wanted to briefly say that it would be amazing if you could change the size of the letters in  your name for free without going through paying just to change that one letter. Because i've seen and heard from a lot of people in game who made the mistake of making that one letter not capital, and im one of those people. xD

replies.body: You've had this name for a really long time, though!  Normally you'd have to purchase a summoner name change to do this, but maybe we can work something out.  No guarantees, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do!
